mapper.select: select count(qna_write_initdate) as todayNewQNA from qna_write where DATE_FORMAT(qna_write_initdate, '%Y-%m-%d') = curdate();
select count(*) as totalQNA from qna_write;
select count(*) as notyetanswerQNA from qna_write;
select sum(order_price) as order_date_sales from orders WHERE DATE_FORMAT (order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = curdate();

select p.product_name, sum(o.order_qty) as order_qty, sum(o.order_price) as order_price from orders o, product p where p.product_id = o.product_id and order_date=curdate() group by product_name order by order_qty desc limit 1;
select count(user_initdate) as count_new_users from user where user_initdate=curdate();
select sum(order_price) as order_week_sales from orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND curdate();

select p.product_name ,sum(o.order_qty) as order_qty , sum(o.order_price) as order_price from orders o, product p where p.product_id=o.product_id and o.order_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(curdate(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK ) AND curdate() group by p.product_name order by order_price desc limit 1;
